Container.Name: fika-spt
Container.Overview:
SPT AKI server backend with Fika mod installed by default. Based off the generous work of zedramus and fellow contributors: https://github.com/zhliau/fika-spt-server-docker.
Check out the project page; there are more server options available, including enabling Modsync and automated mod installs.
This is a barebones template to get your SPT/Fika server up and running quickly on Unraid.
Container.DonateText: If you like my work please consider donating.

Config.Name: Server Files
Config.Description: Location of required server files, user profiles, server (user/mod) mods, etc.

Config.Name: Listen on All Interfaces
Config.Description: Set SPT server to listen on all network interfaces
